alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:13PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Suffolk and east central Nassau Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dix Hills, or over Huntington Station, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Commack, Huntington Station, Plainview, Hauppauge, Syosset, Huntington, Stony Brook, Farmingdale, Northport, Hicksville, Dix Hills, Smithtown, Melville, Woodbury and Centerport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
